name: Dark & Wide OKcupid
description: I found okcupid to be way too bright. Made it over so I can read it better.
additional_info:
Built on aSakofDonuts's "Dark grey and blue OkCupid" Their figuring out of match cards inspired me. Inspired me to build directly on his work. :)

Stole SonarEclipse's "OKCupid Full-Screen" whole. They did good work and integrated at the end. Thanks. My work is messy at best and pasted in randomly and likely is very inefficient as things are repeated and covered twice or more. It works and looks way better and is easier on the eyes for sure. Check out my other amalgamations. 

Thanks again to both.
